VIII.iii.9.B.1.a
.
EP Control and Tracking for Environmental and Military Occupational Hazard Claims
Upon receipt of a substantially complete claim for service connection (SC) based on exposure to a specific environmental or military occupational hazard,
establish the end product (EP), and
affix the relevant special issue indicator(s), if one exists, in accordance with
M21-4, Appendix E
.
References
:Â  For more information on
establishing claims, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 3.A
, and
assigning special issues, see
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.F.2
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B - Processing Claims Based on Exposure to Specific Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B
